title: The Art of eating
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Douglas Jackson and Ian McLaren
brief_description: The film, a visual and gustatory delight, mixes humour with superb food and takes us into the banquet hall where le Club Prosper Montagne, regarded as North America’s most knowledgeable gastronomic society, is holding its biannual dinner. It also takes us into the kitchen where Chef Marcel Kretz is coordinating this delicate event.
